fields.name: PatientID
fields.description: Patient identifier

fields.name: StudyID
fields.description: Study identifier. Used to identify a visit. (Unique per dataset or per patient)

fields.name: SeriesDescription
fields.description: Series description. Used to describe the scanning sequence/protocol. Must be stable over time.

fields.name: SeriesNumber
fields.description: Series number. Used to identify a scan run.

fields.name: InstanceNumber
fields.description: Image (slice) identifier.

fields.name: ImagePosition
fields.description: Image (slice) position.

fields.name: ImageOrientation
fields.description: Image (slice) orientation.

fields.name: SliceLocation
fields.description: Slice location.

fields.name: SamplesPerPixel
fields.description: Number of samples (planes) per pixel. Usually, 1 for monochrome (gray scale) and palette color images, or 3 for RGB images.

fields.name: Rows
fields.description: Number of rows in the image.

fields.name: Columns
fields.description: Number of columns in the image.

fields.name: PixelSpacing
fields.description: Distance between the center of each pixel.

fields.name: BitsAllocated
fields.description: Number of bits allocated for each pixel sample.

fields.name: BitsStored
fields.description: Number of bits stored for each pixel sample.

fields.name: HighBit
fields.description: Most significant bit for pixel sample data.

fields.name: AcquisitionDate
fields.description: Acquisition date. We try to use it as the scan date.

fields.name: SeriesDate
fields.description: Series (scan run) date. If AcquisitionDate is missing, we use it as a scan date.

fields.name: PatientAge
fields.description: Patient age at scan date.

fields.name: PatientBirthDate
fields.description: Patient’s birth date.

fields.name: MagneticFieldStrength
fields.description: Magnetic field strength.

fields.name: PatientSex
fields.description: Patient gender.

fields.name: Manufacturer
fields.description: Scanner manufacturer.

fields.name: ManufacturerModelName
fields.description: Scanner model name.

fields.name: InstitutionName
fields.description: Institution name.

fields.name: StudyDescription
fields.description: Study (visit) description.

fields.name: SliceThickness
fields.description: Slice thickness in mm.

fields.name: RepetitionTime
fields.description: The period of time in msec between the beginning of a pulse sequence and the beginning of the succeeding (essentially identical) pulse sequence.

fields.name: EchoTime
fields.description: Time in ms between the middle of the excitation pulse and the peak of the echo produced (kx=0).

fields.name: SpacingBetweenSlices
fields.description: Spacing between slices in mm (from center to center).

fields.name: NumberOfPhaseEncodingSteps
fields.description: Total number of lines in k-space in the ‘y’ direction collected during acquisition.

fields.name: EchoTrainLength
fields.description: Number of lines in k-space acquired per excitation per image.

fields.name: PercentPhaseFieldOfView
fields.description: Ratio of field of view dimension in phase direction to field of view dimension in frequency direction, expressed as a percent.

fields.name: PixelBandwidth
fields.description: Reciprocal of the total sampling period, in hertz per pixel.

fields.name: FlipAngle
fields.description: Steady state angle in degrees to which the magnetic vector is flipped from the magnetic vector of the primary field.

fields.name: PercentSampling
fields.description: Fraction of acquisition matrix lines acquired, expressed as a percent.

fields.name: EchoNumbers
fields.description: The echo number used in generating this image. In the case of segmented k-space, it is the effective Echo Number.
